DOC.brief_summary: To perform exploratory single center randomize study form basis large scale , definitive randomize clinical trial determine optimal time stroke intensive motor training . The investigator perform prospective exploratory study upper extremity ( UE ) motor training deliver high usual intensity three different time point stroke : - early ( initiate within 30 day ) - subacute/outpatient ( initiate within 2-3 month ) - chronic ( initiate within 6-9 month ) The control group receive therapy intervention 1-year study . Outcome measure assess baseline , pre-treatment , post-treatment , 6 month one year stroke onset . Compared individual randomize outpatient ( 2-3 month stroke onset ) chronic ( 6-9 month stroke onset ) time point , participant randomize early intensive motor training show great upper extremity motor improvement measure one year post stroke .
